name: Runner (itch) (mazzas-gaming)
description:
IMPORTANT!!! 

Run the game from the folder. Do not send it or drag it to desktop. 

Some levels might get frustrating so be patient and try your best

IMPORTANT!!!

Runner is a 3rd person platform game developed in Unreal Engine 4 by Mario Enchev.  
Its an obstacle type of game and the goal is to complete the two main levels. In each level there are different types of obstacles the player must go past and avoid being killed. 

There is a menu with instructions and settings. If you get tired of playing then make sure you get on the last checkpoint to save the game this way you can start from the last saved checkpoint.

When you reach the final step of the second level you will unlock a bonus game.

Please leave a review of what you think about the game. Any feedback would be good to.
